law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 193, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 17, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 156, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (13), (21) and (30). -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 2.
